***Presenting.......***

***The Future of Rover Technology***

***The Uni-Roller! And Now Twin-Roller!***

![hUv0uHN.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/hUv0uHN.jpg)

**The Uni-Roller is a 100% stock Jet-Propelled rover inside of a large freely rotating wheel made of high durability parts.**

**The Uni-Roller can obtain speeds up to 40 M/S. Unfortunately the faster it goes the greater the force placed on the wheel. The faster the speed the larger the wheel stretches. The more the wheel stretches the likelier the possibility of a mechanical failure resulting in serious damage.**

**The maximum safe speed on level ground is around 20-30 M/S. It is recommended to make turns under 25 M/S as the small stabilizers on the side cannot keep the craft from flipping on its side at faster speeds.**

Download and drive it yourself here: [https://www.dropbox.com/s/muxvqi6r9jgaxms/UniRoller.craft?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/muxvqi6r9jgaxms/UniRoller.craft?dl=0)

The Twin-Roller is a continuation of the Uni-Roller but as it's name suggests... Has two wheels instead of one. All rules that apply to the Uni-Roller apply to the Twin-Roller.

Download the Twin-Roller here: [https://www.dropbox.com/s/aydgcht0bljvuoq/Twin-Roller.craft?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/aydgcht0bljvuoq/Twin-Roller.craft?dl=0)

**Known Glitch:** Since the outside part of the wheel is uncontrolled it will likely be deleted as debris after going back to the space center. If you do not wish this to happen attach a small probe core to the inside portion of the outer wheel or wheels.
